dunes-script-module.name: getFruits
dunes-script-module.description:
This action returns a list of types of fruit as an array of strings.
This action was created by Brian Watrous. Learn more about vRO at his blog, www.vvork.info (that's vee-vee-oh-arrr-kay, not double-you-oh-arrr-kay).
These actions are distributed in the hope that they will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
